SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.networking.socket.server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
The ClientHandler class processes incoming requests from clients to perform actions like creating, joining, leaving, or reconnecting to a game. Communication occurs via the Socket Network protocol.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientHandler

      public ClientHandler(Socket socketClient) throws IOException
      Constructs a handler for a specific client socket.
      Parameters:
      socketClient - The socket connected to the client.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs when creating input/output streams.

  • Method Details

    • updateGameControllerAndNickname

      private void updateGameControllerAndNickname(GameControllerInterface controller, SocketClientGenericMessage message)
      Updates the GameController and the client's nickname based on the provided controller. If the controller is non-null, it retrieves the nickname from the controller. If the controller is null, it sets the nickname to null, indicating no valid controller is associated.
      Parameters:
      controller - The GameController instance to set. This controller may be null if the previous execution did not result in a valid controller.
      message - The message containing the nickname client.

    • processMessageForMainController

      private void processMessageForMainController(SocketClientGenericMessage message)
      Processes a message that is intended for the MainController. This method extracts the game controller from the message and updates the current game controller and the client's nickname associated with this handler.
      Parameters:
      message - The socket client generic message intended for the MainController. This message should contain the necessary information to fetch or create a GameController instance.

    • runGameLogic

      private void runGameLogic()
      Executes the game logic for the client.

    • shutdownGameLogicExecutor

      private void shutdownGameLogicExecutor()
      Gracefully shuts down the game logic executor.

    • interruptThread

      public void interruptThread()
      Interrupts the client handler thread.

    • run

      public void run()
      Processes all actions received from the client, delegating them to the appropriate game controller.
